original_text: Your leaders will all disappear, as if a strong wind had blown them away. Enemies will take your friends away as prisoners. Then you will feel very ashamed, because of all the wicked things that you have done. Your leaders will all disappear,
korean_text: 네 목자들은 다 바람에 삼켜질 것이요 너를 사랑하는 자들은 사로잡혀 가리니 그 때에 네가 반드시 네 모든 악 때문에 수치와 욕을 당하리라

sentences.original_text: as if a strong wind had blown them away.
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 강한 바람이 그들을 날려버린 것처럼.

sentences.original_text: Enemies will take your friends away as prisoners.
sentences.korean_translation: 원수들이 네 친구들을 포로로 잡아 갈 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Then you will feel very ashamed,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 매우 부끄러움을 느낄 것이며,

sentences.original_text: because of all the wicked things that you have done.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 행한 모든 악한 일들 때문에.
